product_name: IGKTravel Size Beach Club Texture Spray
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingIGK Volumizing Texture Spray is a salt-free texturizing spray for year-round beach hair. With Hydrating Glycerin + Gluten-Free Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein. You have: Lifeless, flat hair/wavy or textured hair. You want: Volume/texture/defined waves/no-crunch or drying.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstantly adds volume and holdAdds buildable, beachy texture with gritNon-drying, salt-free formulaVegan & Cruelty-FreeKey IngredientsGlycerin: Helps lock in moisture and adds textureGluten-free Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein: Gives hair natural volume and bodyFormulated WithoutGlutenParabensSulfates (SLS or SLES)PetrolatumMineral OilItem 2546420How To UseShake well and hold can 10-12 inches from head. Spray onto wet or dry hair in sections for touchable breeze-blown texture and instant volume. Begin with a small amount and add as needed.All-over Texture/Volume. Spray in sections all over head. Lift hair and flip head over to ensure you hit all layers of the hair.Beach Waves: Grab small sections of hair and spray onto each section. Twist. Release twisted section and let it fall out naturally.Blow Dried Textured Look: Spray all over and blow dry for added texture and volume.Curls/Coiled Look: Spray on damp or dry hair and scrunch for sheen, support, and soft, touchable texture.Precautions: FLAMMABLE. CONTENTS UNDER PRESSURE. Avoid spraying near eyes. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 120F. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Keep away from heat/sparks/open flames/hot surfaces-no smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents may be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children.IngredientsHydrofluorocarbon 152a, Dimethyl Ether, Alcohol Denat., VP/VA Copolymer, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Zeolite, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Amodimethicone, PVP, Phenethyl Benzoate, Polyisobutene, Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Parfum/Fragrance, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Coumarin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shake well and hold can 10-12 inches from head. Spray onto wet or dry hair in sections for touchable breeze-blown texture and instant volume. Begin with a small amount and add as needed.All-over Texture/Volume. Spray in sections all over head. Lift hair and flip head over to ensure you hit all layers of the hair.Beach Waves: Grab small sections of hair and spray onto each section. Twist. Release twisted section and let it fall out naturally.Blow Dried Textured Look: Spray all over and blow dry for added texture and volume.Curls/Coiled Look: Spray on damp or dry hair and scrunch for sheen, support, and soft, touchable texture.Precautions: FLAMMABLE. CONTENTS UNDER PRESSURE. Avoid spraying near eyes. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 120F. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Keep away from heat/sparks/open flames/hot surfaces-no smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents may be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children.

reviews.headline: Good product but not what I wanted
reviews.comments: I have wavy to curly and fine hair. I tried using this to add texture in the mornings on my fully dry hair and it pretty much just felt like using a light weight hair spray. It smells really good but it didn't add any noticeable texture.

reviews.headline: Love this! Smells amazing
reviews.comments: Love this product! Hair smells sooo good after!

reviews.headline: Love it!!
reviews.comments: You don't need to spray alot on your hair to give it texture..

reviews.headline: One of my mainstays
reviews.comments: This has been one of my mainstays for a couple of years now. This adds so much beachy volume to my fine wavy hair. I only use this product for concerts etc because i do feel i have to wash my hair a day or 2 after using. I love it otherwise.

reviews.headline: Did not love it
reviews.comments: Was recommended by someone at Ulta I assume since it's a surf spray that you put it on wet hair… But you put it on dry hair so it doesn't really make sense if you have curly or wavy hair… In other words you can't tell if it worked only if you have straight hair and then I'm not sure straight hair will even curl from this stuff… Makes way more sense to have a product you can put on wet hair and then it dries in beachy curls

reviews.headline: Not what I expected, but still good.
reviews.comments: Now that i am re-reading the packaging, it says "no crunch" on it. The "no crunch" means no fresh out of the ocean texture. I was looking for a texture spray that gave tue super piecey, salt water-esq texture. This product is more soft to the touch and adds lots of volume but without the piecey, ocean hair feel. So, it does what it says. I just wanted that tough texture to my hair with a little bit of weigh-down. Its good. And it smells lovely. Like fresh from the salon scent. Not a beachy summery scent. Still nice. Ill try something else next time.

reviews.headline: smells bad
reviews.comments: I really don't like the smell. on top of that, it keeps making me sneeze

reviews.headline: Best hair spray I have ever used!
reviews.comments: Have used this product for a few years! It doesn't leave a residue on your hair like other sprays. Great hold.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: My hairdresser used this in my hair at my recent appointment & I immediately made a mental note of it to purchase later! Adds great texture to my short, fine hair & it smells so good!

reviews.headline: I love this stuff!
reviews.comments: I took this on a trip with me and used a whole travel can to keep humidity frizz down. It is now part of my arsenal of hair supplies. It smells amazing, is relaly lightweight, which is great for my fine hair. This is not a true hairspray and will not hold like a hairspray, but can be used in conjunction with hairspray. I use this will IGK Good Behavior spirulina protein spray.

reviews.headline: Best Texture Spray
reviews.comments: Smells great! Guves texture and lift without making hair feel icky.

reviews.headline: Will Not Be Buying This Again
reviews.comments: The product did leave a texture and add volume as advertised, so much so that it would take multiple washes to get my hair feeling clean again. However, the scent is what really killed this product for me. It is a VERY strong coconut odor that I did not care for.

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments:
This texture spray by IGK is my absolute favorite. The texture of it almost reminds me of a dry shampoo. 

I hate mt hair feeling so smooth after washes. I just add a little of this and I'm able to get my hair to hold pretty good!

reviews.headline: Gave me the Ick.
reviews.comments: Even tho it was a travel size it was extremely over priced and the way it made my hair feel gave me the Ick. Took 3 washes to bring my hair bk to normal. Not for me,

reviews.headline: Just enough texturizing
reviews.comments: Gives my fine straight hair just enough boost

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Smells so so good!

reviews.headline: Adds volume but has texture spray
reviews.comments: It adds volume to your hair but it leaves you with a hairspray texture thats not fun to brush out. The scent is very light, smells like a salty beach.

reviews.headline: Holy grail item
reviews.comments: I love this stuff! I use it in my fine 2b hair. A little goes a long way

reviews.headline: Didn't work for ne
reviews.comments: This did absolutely nothing for my fine hair, and I also didn't like the smell. I'll be going back to Living Proof full dry volume blast. I just wanted to try something different. Guess I should just stick to what I know works :)

reviews.headline: BUY it!!
reviews.comments: Added a lot of volume with no greasy feel and a beautiful smell!

media.headline: Love this -- one of my favorite hair care secrets!
media.caption: Love this -- one of my favorite hair care secrets!

media.headline: LONG HEAVY HAIR GETS A LIFT!
media.caption: LONG HEAVY HAIR GETS A LIFT!

media.headline: I lovr this it makes my suprr finehair full and think

faceoff_positive.comments: *Completely* blown away. WOW!! I have very fine hair that is super sensitive to product and when I tell you I have tried everything, I mean it. I had given up on hair products altogether until a friend recommended IGK Beach Club. This stuff is incredible—it gives me volume, smells amazing, and doesn't cause any grease or shorten the life of my hair (I like to wash every 2-3 days). THANK YOU IGK I LOVE YOU.
faceoff_positive.headline: Magic in a can

faceoff_negative.comments: I have short, straight, soft hair which needs some grip and texture. This spray is okay. It's lightweight and comes out with the velocity of a firehose so it penetrates and doesn't just land on the surface of the hair. I don't think it's that different from an ordinary hairspray - ? -  and I really, really don't like the smell. My hair looks pretty good though, the spray doesn't dull the shine or anything. I probably won't repurchase just because of the smell.
faceoff_negative.headline: Probably good if you like the smell

rollup.name: Travel Size Beach Club Texture Spray
